text.section:
Sec. 2-11.28. Members of County Canvassing Board.
Commencing with the effective date of this section, County Commissioners shall be assigned to serve on the Canvassing Board in rotation, starting with District 1 and continuing through District 13.
A County Commissioner assigned to a Canvassing Board shall notify the Supervisor of Elections in writing as to his or her ability to serve.
In the event a County Commissioner is unable to serve, either because he or she is a candidate with opposition in the election being canvassed or is otherwise unavailable, the next Commission District in numerical order shall serve.
Before any Commissioner shall be requested to serve an additional time, the Supervisor of Elections shall provide the Commission with a list of those Commissioners, if any, who were unable to serve in rotation, and those Commissioners, in numerical order, be then requested to serve.
